attributes.action: Ask Her Royal Majesty Queen Elizabeth II to call for a second EU referendum.
attributes.additional_details:
Professor Michael Dougan, the leading EU lawyer, has assessed the UK’s position following the vote to leave the EU (21 mins, "dishonesty on an industrial scale")
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0dosmKwrAbI
attributes.background:
Truths about the Leave Campaign in the EU referendum that took place on Thursday 23 June 2016, are starting to pile up, showing that the campaign was run using estimates and outright lies to scaremonger support and unlawfully improve their position.
"No Brexit" by the people should be heard.
